archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: CRM systeem
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Een systeem dat het relatiebeheer in de brede zin ondersteunt.

properties.value: SugarCRM (http://www.sugarcrm.com), Microsoft Dynamics CRM (http://crm.dynamics.com/nl-nl/), Salesforce.com (http://www.salesforce.com), Oracle Siebel CRM (http://www.oracle.com/us/products/applications/siebel/overview/index.html), SAP CRM (http://www.sap.com/netherlands/solutions/business-process/customer-relationship-management.epx), Quobell Q-relatie (http://www.q-relatie.nl), Stb CRM (http://www.stb.nl/producten/stb-crm/stb-crm.html)
